patthana22.16:1.1: Nakusalaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.16:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ
patthana22.16:2.1_1: naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ naaraṇañca
patthana22.16:2.1_2: naabyākataṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.16:2.1_3: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
